item.title: Are You Making This Common Spelling Mistake When Writing 'Veteran'? Find Out Now!
item.description: IV. Conclusion Introduction to Veteran Spelling As a nation, we owe a debt of gratitude to our veterans. To honor their service, it’s important to make sure we’re spelling their title correctly. Unfortunately, many people make a common mistake when it comes to spelling the word “veteran.” In this post, we’ll discuss what the correct spelling is, why this mistake is so common, and how to avoid it in the future.
